author: John Doe
title: Top Courses for 2024: Learn from Google, IBM, and More—For Free!
content:
Master high-demand skills with top courses from industry giants like Google, IBM, and Meta—all for free! Secure your future with these high-paying courses and boost your career to new heights. 
 No prerequisites required. 
 Gain free access to over 7000 courses: https://link.example
